definition: to give guidance/to mentor/to counsel/to coach/to tutor
to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct

sentences.english: The Research Team of Campsite Guidance, Haizhu District, Guangzhou.
sentences.chinese: 广州市海珠区营地辅导研究课题组。

sentences.english: Most school counselors have offices where you can sit down and talk.
sentences.chinese: 大多数学校的辅导员都有办公室，你能坐下来谈谈。

sentences.english: This service is provided free of charge by Unitarian Universalists Hong Kong's qualified counsellor.
sentences.chinese: 这项服务由寻道会专业辅导人员免费提供。

sentences.english: The database could be used as a teaching resource in colleges.
sentences.chinese: 资料库可以用作大学里的一种教学辅导手段。

sentences.english: I'm going to give you an example of a therapy session.
sentences.chinese: 现在我举一个心理辅导的例子。

sentences.english: She was homeschooled by her mom.
sentences.chinese: 她由妈妈辅导在家自学。

sentences.english: Both are known for their devotion to mentoring, Backus says.
sentences.chinese: 巴克斯说，两人都以热心辅导学生而著称。

sentences.english: And I met several difficult problems when I tutored the students this afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 今天下午，我在辅导学生的过程中遇到了几道难题。

sentences.english: Many times we have life coaches of our own.
sentences.chinese: 很多时候我们都有自己的生活辅导员。

sentences.english: I suggest that you should talk to a professional counselor at your university.
sentences.chinese: 我建议妳跟大学里的职业辅导员相谈一下。

sentences.english: You can sign up for the program with him and begin the tutoring next week.
sentences.chinese: 您可以与他的方案和开始下一周的课外辅导。

sentences.english: Send him to counseling and require that he compensate his victim.
sentences.chinese: 送他去个别辅导，并且要求他补偿他的受害者。

sentences.english: Counselors meet with students individually or in small groups.
sentences.chinese: 辅导员与学生单个见面，或小组见面。

sentences.english: The Freshman Orientation Seminar was held.
sentences.chinese: 举办学士班新生辅导说明会。

sentences.english: Early results suggest that online tutoring may improve student performance.
sentences.chinese: 初步的成绩表明，在线辅导可以提高学生表现。

definition: to take extra lessons in a cram school or with a private tutor
to mark (homework, exam scripts etc)/to correct and criticize (an article)/to check/to correct/a correction (to a piece of writing)
to answer questions (as teacher or consultant)/to clarify doubts
tutorial/period of tuition for one or two students
to attend a class/to go to a lecture
to make up missed lesson/to reschedule a class
